member.summary: Reads the data drive file and set test name.
member.param: Full path to XML DataDriveFile file.
Name of the child element in xml file.
Values of listed parameters will be used in test case name.
Name of the test, use as prefix for test case name.
member.exception: Exception when element not found in file.
Exception when parameter not found in row.

member.name: M:Ocaramba.SeleniumTests.DataDriven.DataDrivenHelper.ReadDataDriveFile(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Reads the data drive file without setting test name.

member.name: M:Ocaramba.SeleniumTests.DataDriven.DataDrivenHelper.ReadXlsxDataDriveFile(System.String,System.String,System.String[],System.String)
member.summary: Reads the Excel data drive file and optionaly set test name.

Name of the sheet at xlsx file.
Optional values of listed parameters will be used in test case name.
Optional name of the test, use as prefix for test case name.
member.exception: Exception when wrong cell type in file.
Exception when parameter not found in row.
